name: Rocket Smash EX
overview: It's time to strap on your trusty jetpack and smash some rockets in this specially EX-panded 64KB version of the RGCD compo hit Rocket Smash! Your goal is simple; on each of the single-screen levels you must reassemble and refuel your crashed rocket ship before your oxygen runs out. However, the hordes of fearsome aliens and deadly meteor showers on each planet will ensure that your mission is far from easy!
